description.pt: Tipo de meio de pagamento selecionado.

description.en: Payment method selected to make the payment.

Determines whether the payment should be captured (true, default value) or only reserved (false).

description.en: How the payment will appear in the card statement.

description.es: Agrupa los detalles de la transacción.
